name: Stay the Night(iTunes Session)
content: I know that we are upside down
So hold your tongue  and hear me out
但请你冷静 然后听我解释
I know that we were made to break
我知道我们的感情出现了裂痕
You cue the lights  I'll draw
不要熄灭你眼中的花火
I know that we were made to break
我知道我们的感情出现了裂痕
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night  Oh
你会留下过夜吗 噢
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
So  are you gonna stay the night
I am a fire  you're gasoline
Come pour yourself all over me
We'll let this place go down
You cue the lights  I'll draw
不要熄灭你眼中的花火
I know that we were made to break
我知道我们的感情出现了裂痕
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
So  are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
So  are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
Are you gonna stay the night
